name: SAMS
description:
The Hermes-2700 spaceship, driven by a fearless pilot, Che goes in search of the planets for the life-giving civilization SAMS, Che's home planet was not suitable for life after the attack of the cruel empire “Pured”

In Sams, you will have to control a spacecraft to destroy enemies, you can play alone or together with friends on one computer.

Features:
  • 6 unique planets
  • Single player game
  • cooperative mode
  • support for two keyboards or two gamepads
